hadiths.text: Narrated AbuQatadah: The Prophet (ﷺ) disapproved of the offering of prayer at the meridian except on Friday. The Hell-fire is kindled except on Friday. Abu Dawud said: This is a mursal tradition (i.e. the successor is narrating it directly from the Prophet). Mujahid is older than Abu al-Khalil, and Abu al-Khalil did not hear (any tradition from) Abu Qatadah

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ قَبْلَ الزَّوَالِ
chapter.eng-name: Praying The Friday Prayer Before The Sun Reaches Its Zenith
